'''''Arda 1986, Volume VI''''' is an issue of the publication ''[[Arda (annual)|Arda]]''. The issue is noteworthy for including a manuscript facsimile of "[[The Clerkes Compleinte]]", a rare poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Notes to the manuscript are provided by [[Christopher Tolkien]] and [[Anders Stenström]].

== Contents ==

*The Clerkes Compleinte Revisited [with facsimile of Tolkien's manuscript] / Djäknens klagan än en gång

*Ian A. Muirhead: Theology in Gandalf's Garden / Teologi i Gandalfs trädgård

*[[Anders Stenström]]: Något om Ringbärarens dagar kring Spindelns Pass / Some Notes on the Ringbearer's Days around the Pass of the Spider

*The Year's Work in Tolkien Studies
*Krönika och rapport / Chronicle and Report
*Recensioner / Reviews

*Brev / Letters

*[[Åke Bertenstam]]: Supplement för 1985-1986 till En Tolkienbibliografi / Supplement for 1985-1986 to A Tolkien Bibliography
